biotools.summary:
A new genome annotation predictor for identifying DNA binding proteins and RNA binding proteins using Convolutional Neural Network and Long Short-Term Memory.
In this study, we proposed a new computational predictor called DeepDRBP-2L for identifying DBPs, RBPs and DRBPs.

DNA-binding proteins (DBPs) and RNA-binding proteins (RBPs) are two kinds of crucial proteins, which are involved in various cellule activities and associated with many diseases
